name: Tom Piper
text: Friendly people.  Great coaches.  Long history of All-star championship teams.

name: LaKesha Fagan
text: Beautiful field. Good concessions. Clean environment.

name: Jamal Windham
text: Diamond in the rough

name: Nathaniel “Ryan” Bowman
text: Yikes!!!!!  The dugout needs love.

name: Linda Richards
text: Haven't been there

name: Haywood Taylor
text: Is very exciting I love watching the young kids play a grandson Jace scored the winning run tonight

name: Randy Montz
text: Great environment for kids and this league seems focused on the kids having fun while learning the game.

name: Mike Mckinney
text: Nice place to play

name: Sylvester Moore Jr
text: Great place

name: Otis Todd
text: Excellent youth baseball league for developing players

name: Frederick Taylor
text: Nice

name: Joshua Henderson
text: I have had a great time watching this league grow. Our third boy started playing last year, and in my 6th year coaching have never seen as fair a draft as we had this past spring. They have been able to grow this league and be fair and ethical doing it. I'm proud to be a part to this organization, and have my boys playing in it.

name: Noel Minger
text: This league does not give these young kids the oppurtnity to learn the game they only care about all star teams and travel ball teams and also do a horrible job of mixing the races of kids on teams, luckily my son has had a FEW good COACHES, I think its time we head elswhere for ball do better PCYB

name: moe miller
text: Nice clean place to go to enjoy watching the kids play ball

name: Travis St. John
text: What is there not to love? Baseball, burgers, hotdogs, coke, sunflower seeds, and pickle pops.  Heaven in one location.

name: Ryan Banks
text:
This is a sad excuse for a youth baseball league. First off they do not ensure that the uniforms that they use accommodate every child.  Secondly the league sees it necessary to stack teams. Thirdly the league president Chris Rogers tells people that PCYB league is a "Christatorship".  Also a board members husband who is a coach by the name of Jerimiah Moss tells a player to sling a bat so hard it flies up a parents a$$.  The league also caters to travel ball players by only having games during the week instead of on Saturday. My child will never play in this league again.

Once again another terrible year with PCYB. Coaches Levi Rentz and Keith Daughtery are complete jerks and only care about travel ball in which their kids play. Practices have been cancelled because of travel ball. These coaches have yelled at players and parents including myself. These 2 want to be men have no business coaching kids.

The league board needs to be completely wiped clean. It's made up of a bunch of arrogant pompas idiots. The feel like this like should be high and mighty. This league should focus on teaching the fundamental and fun but that's not the case. The board also conducts illegal activities by holding raffle which is illegal in Alabama.

name: Shonda Augustin
text: Very unprofessional....rude and nasty to players

name: Patrishia James
text: Fun for the kids

name: Wendy Bowick
text: It’s not the same with out Lori running it. It’s gone down hill

name: Desiree Skidmore
text: All 3 of my kids (both boys in baseball since they were 4!)  And my daughter has been on baseball teams and softball here since she was 4! I love it!

name: Robert Draper
text: There we're tons of yellow jackets with multiple people getting stung. Then when asking for spray the workers just deflected and said there was nothing they could do and proceeded to get ride with us. The park as a whole just has a real conceited vibe to it.

name: Timothy Cobb
text: Just signed my 4 yr old son for T ball. So don't know too much about the place yet but so far so good

name: Vanessa
text: Mark Coates has done a wonderful job making key improvements to the park. The new batting cages, landscaping and overall maintenance  has been great.

name: Michael Robinson
text: Well kept and everyone was nice

name: Larry Fairchild
text: Nice uppity folks

name: steven cordelle
text: Went there to watch my son play baseball and I’m in a wheelchair. All the handicap spots where taken and actually seen a ref in his car putting his pads on in one of the spots

name: Maighan McCoy
text: We LOVE the Semmes Ball Park!!!

name: John Ghegan
text:
Great group of people. The organization has been a God send for my son.. This is his first year of ball. Thanks to the all who help and support them
God Bless

name: Annie Johnson
text: Very nice ball park.

name: Pete Taylor
text: Totally a class organization this is where you need to bring your kids if you live anywhere near The Sims ballpark they are so cool and so helpful and what an awesome community

name: Sarah b Fowler
text: Watching two sweet children play ball . Kyleigh and Maddox. Love it 💖🙏

name: Theresa Johnson
text: A great place to have baseball games

name: Ricky Rice
text: Nice facilities

name: Jessie Mobley Jr
text: They do an excellent job of teaching kids the fundamentals of baseball.

name: Donald Baldwin
text: Great ballpark! Please don't throw your trash on the ground.

name: Jeannette Mangham
text: Nice family atmosphere.

name: Zoey Bishop
text: It's ok

name: Linda boudreaux
text: Enjoyed our visit

text: best program in the state

name: Thea Martinez
text: Great group of people

text: Great atmosphere for kids , clean and nice

text: Great program and park
